ESRS reference
ESRS S1 paragraph 50 (a), and AR54
Key terms
Significant employment
Background
ESRS S1-6 paragraph 50 (a) requires the disclosure of the following information: ‘the total number
of employees by head count, and breakdowns by gender and by country for countries in which
the undertaking has 50 or more employees representing at least 10% of its total number of
